data.eml:eml: Viola kauaensis var. hosakae (Violaceae), a new variety of endemic Hawaiian violet

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Havran, J. Christopher, Harbin, Susan Ching, Portner, Talia (2014): Viola kauaensis var. hosakae (Violaceae), a new variety of endemic Hawaiian violet. PhytoKeys 39: 35-48, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.39.6500, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.39.6500
